messages.subject: Team Building Activity
messages.body:
My loyal subjects, this is your commander, your team captain ordering you to attend our intensive team building event in the conference room. Event kicks off at 1 so don't be late! Come prepared to sweat as the winners receive new cars! Yes, totally going to give away new cars, everyone likes new cars. Also Toby, you are not invited please just get up and walk out of the office if you are reading this, everyone else I look forward to seeing participate in our glorious activity.

- Micheal Scott
  Regional Manager

messages.subject: Shh...Upcoming Prank on Dwight
messages.body:
Keep it secret, keep it safe. Me and Pam are planning the ultimate prank on Dwight. Next Tuesday a man we have hired will come into the office and ask for Dwight. He will then present himself as national beet judge here to invite Dwight to compete in the beet finals in California. He will present Dwight with the necessary passes, tickets and instructions on where to go. The prank part is we are actually just sending Dwight to Coachella. He will hate it! LOL!

- Jim Halpert
  Sales Executive

messages.subject: Noise Complaint
messages.body:
Excuse me everyone but would it be too hard to get some damn peace and quick around here, it's hard enough that I had to actually show up to this dump but I also worked a good part of the morning and need my afternoon power nap so I can make it through till 5. I don't ask for much but please shut up!

- Stanley Hudson
  Sales Executive

messages.subject: Your upcoming HR review
messages.body:
Uhhh yeah, sooo it's that time again. Time for reviews. If everyone could just try and get through their reviews this year without screaming at me I would really appreciate it. It's hard enough that I have to write these all up and send them to corperate.

Please see the attachments for last year's results and for god's sake please come to review this year with some professional goals.

- Toby Flenderson
  HR Manager

messages.subject: New Fridge?
messages.body:
Hey guys, as many of you know I recently got married to Bob Vance of Vance Refridgeration. Now we all know Bob takes care of us and our warehouse but he is going to extra mile and told me he would offer anyone in our office a new fridge for 30% off! 30% off is very generous and as you know my new husband is very generous ;). Please let me know how many refrigerators you want and when you would like them delivered and I will pass the info onto Bob.

- Phyllis Vance
  Sales Representative

messages.subject: Vending Machines Issue!
messages.body:
EVERYONE! The vending machines have a very serious issue. They are out of mini’s! I could of sworn for the past 8 months I have been getting my little Jims and Jacks out of both of our machines! I can feel my buzz wearing off and I am afraid what will happen if that occurs. I haven’t been truly sober in 16 years! Thanks everyone I know we can get to the bottom of this.

- Meredith Palmer
  Purchasing/Supplier Relations

messages.subject: Community food in fridge
messages.body:
Dear Office

This is Kevin
I have noticed that people tend to leave some of their lunches in the community fridge. These left lunches are taking up way too much space, I can’t even fit the two rotisserie chickens I brought for lunch today in there.

I propose that I will eat anyone’s lunch that has been in the fridge for over a 2 weeks. This is just gonna help everyone.

- Kevin Malone
  Accountant
